reviews.review_text: I've been a regular to this place since many years. Best place for Beef chilly fry. Serves authentic dishes that you'll surely admire. The location is excellent, the corner, nearest to the Candolim beach parking really helps getting there easily. Tony is a great proud owner! The staff are courteous and overall very good service. The visit to Goa is not complete without dining here at least once.

Teama Bar and Restaurant is a hidden gem near the beach, offering a delightful dining experience. With a diverse menu featuring excellent vegetarian and non-vegetarian options, every dish is packed with flavor. The ambiance is charming, the service impeccable, and the music creates a relaxing vibe. Its convenient location and exceptional quality make it a place worth visiting again and again. Highly recommended!

Attentive staff with a reasonable menu.
The upstairs seating was comfortable and quieter than downstairs.
The pork could have been cooked better but everything else was well made and tasty.
